title: Bad Boy
lyrics: Tone Who dat who dat who dat boy (Woo) sumaneun sa ram sok nune ttin (Ah ha) mushimhan geu pyojeong I like that Oh shikeuhan seutaireun deom ibeun oseun shingyeong sseun deut an sseun deut (an sseun deut) gwanshim eomneun maltu I like that dal la dodohan nal utge haja na (Right) aljana yojeum naega Hot ah ah hollin deut nal ttarawa modu hwanhohae neodo got Ooh ooh (Oh-eh-oh-eh-oh) neomu shwipgen oji ma jaemieopjana geogiseo Ooh ooh (Oh-eh-oh-eh-oh) shijakalkke Bad boy down Whoa whoa oh oh whoa whoa oh oh jigeumbuteo Bad boy down jamkkan iri wabwa neoegeman hal mari isseo gakkai jom wa gogael sugyeo kireul natchweobwa uh dareun geon shingyeong sseuji ma sanghwangeun jom dallajeo (Woo) juwireul maem doneun naega gunggeumhae neodo alge dwel kkeoya (mweolkka?) al kkeoya (malhae) ma ja sashil kkwaena jashin isseo nan (Right) jineun geim hajin ana Ha ah ah hollin deut nal ttarawa modu hwanhohae neodo got Ooh ooh (Oh-eh-oh-eh-oh) neomu shwipgen oji ma jaemieopjana geogiseo Ooh ooh (Oh-eh-oh-eh-oh) shijakalkke Bad boy down hollanseureon mamiget ji sangsangjocha motal kkeo ya heeonaryeo noryeokaedo eotteon jageun teumdo eop seo jeongdabeun jeonghaejeo is seo jayeonseureopge neon ttarawa hollin deut nal ttarawa modu hwanhohae neodo got Ooh ooh (Oh-eh-oh-eh-oh) neomu shwipgen oji ma jaemieopjana geogiseo Ooh ooh (Oh-eh-oh-eh-oh) shijakalkke Bad boy down
